info.title: PROXY-MAN API Docs
info.description: Each endpoint includes examples in various programming languages. You can «Export» the documentation as OpenAPI for use in Postman, Insomnia, and other tools. API rate limit — 3 req/s

path.description: Base path for paginator generated URLs.

per_page.description: Number of items shown per page.

to.description: Number of the last item in the slice.

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

ttl_minutes.description: -1 = rotate IP every request, 0 = keep ip as long as possible, 1+ = rotate every X minute
